name: 陳盛有
objective:
1.複數
2.複函數
3.諧和函數
4.複數積分
5.柯西積分理論
6.複冪級數
7.洛冉級數,餘數
8.保角寫像
schedule: 1.Complex Numbers  2.Moduli  3.Roots  4.Analytic Functions 5.Cauchy-Riemann Equations  6.Logarithmic Functions  7.Exponents  8.Line Integrals  9.Midterm Exam  10.Cauchy Integral Theorem  11.Cauchy Integral Formula  12.Taylor Series  13.Laurent Series  14.Residue Theorem  15.Singular Points  16.Improper Integrals  17.Definite Integrals  18.Final Exam
scorePolicy: 1.Attendance and Assignments and Quiz 30%  2.Midterm Exam 30%  3.Final Exam 40%
materials: Brown,Churchill    Comples Variables and Applications   8th Ed.
